basic.description: This course offers the opportunity to study either a single author in-depth or to follow a specific theme that may extend over a brief period or over centuries. Course material may include non-literary textual and audio-visual material. May be repeated to a maximum of nine semester hours.
basic.subject: GEW
basic.title: Studies in an Author or Theme

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: Two 3000-level courses or instructor permission.
